item.description:
Hot pot is the perfect cure to the cold weather.  Let's enjoy some delicious shabu hot pot. Please be prompt as the restaurant does get very crowded on a Saturday night. It's the weekend before thanksgiving. Come and join us in a festive pre-thanksgiving dinner and let us know what your holiday plans are.  

After hot pot we will go for karoke (optional) nearby @ Do Rei Mi.

How to get there: take B train on greenline to Packards corner and walk a few blocks to the restaurant.

If you plan on driving there's limited street parking, more closer to super 88 area. Shabu Zen has parking in the back of the restaurant. It's a small lot, but worth checking if there's a parking space.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the front reception area

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Shabu hot pot & karoke
